name: winds under a lost sky
description:
code / art / music by petet

wind sfx by august soren

press f4 to toggle full-screen in the downloaded version!

made for PIGSquad's June 2021 summer slow jam!  my first solo game jam in about a year.  the level design was a bit of an afterthought, but I am very happy with the aesthetic nonetheless.

(update: html5 build added!  the object pooling's leading to some small visual glitches, which I might try and fix when I can.)
